law.catch_line: Small purchases by local public agencies.
law.text: The local public agency may use small purchase procedures for any contract for which a determination is made that the aggregate amount of the contract does not exceed twenty thousand dollars ($20,000) if small purchase procedures are in writing and available to the public.
law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 192, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2002. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 95, sec. 2, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 6, sec. 2, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 250, sec. 13, effective April 9, 1980. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 110, sec. 78, effective January 1, 1980.
